::KitKat::

Sees Megatron and the others arrive. "YES, HURRAY FOR OUR SIDE!"
KitKat remembered her clone. She activated it and set it on battle 
mode. She ordered it to start firing on the Allience members.  The 
clone came out of the trees in bot mode and started to open fire ont 
he Allience members. 
"Megatron, your clone is programed to respond to only you now. Use 
it."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Ok, I dont know what exactly is going on because no one has 
filled me 
> in...but here it goes...
> 
>     Aracnia, followed by Paralysis, and Aerostreak, entered the 
room....im 
> guessing....and saw Kitkat being attacked by several Allience 
members. 
> "Paralysis, cover Kitkat, Aerosreak get in the air!" She screamed, 
as he took 
> out her bowcaster and fired.
>     Megatron, along with Waspinator, Adrax, Tarantulas, Hell BEast, 
and 
> Gremlin converged on Kitkats location. "Ah, I see you couldnt wait. 
Send my 
> regards to Zardus, would you?" Megatron siad, as he and his troops 
fell into 
> place, blasting any Allience member in sight.
